revised_title: The Specific Action of Bacterial Endotoxins on Phagocytosis and a New Method for Differentiating Bacteria
tldr: The authors investigated the effects of bacterial endotoxins on phagocytosis and discovered that they have a specific action on different organisms. They also developed a new method for differentiating bacteria based on their endotoxin properties. The endotoxins were found to be thermostable, maintaining their activity even after exposure to high temperatures.
